Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and loses all abilities.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a permanent you control.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

Deathtouch

When Ripple Banshee enters, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way.
When Megacolony Medic enters, each player discards a card. If you discarded a card this way, draw a card.

{4}{B}{B}, Exile Boarding Specialist from your graveyard: Create two 2/2 black Pirate creature tokens, then check 2. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then reveal any number of them.)[/i]

Flying
When Canteen Ghostie enters, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If it was a Pirate or Vampire card, draw a card.

[i]Threshold[/i] — When Corrupted Komainu enters, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, target player loses 4 life.
When you discard Corrupted Komainu, you may pay {B}. When you do, target player loses 2 life.
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, sanctify it instead. [i](Put it into its owner's sanctum.)[/i]
Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.”
You draw 2 cards, lose 2 life, and check 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it.)[/i]
Look at target player's hand. You may sanctify a nonland card from it. Conjure a Lock into that player's sanctum. [i](Put it into its owner's sanctum.)[/i]
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. If its mana value was 3 or less, sanctify it instead. [i](Put it into its owner's sanctum.)[/i]
Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than the number of cards in your graveyard.

Trample, haste

Black Dwarf Burst deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, conjure a Lock into its controller's sanctum.

If you control or revealed a creature card with 4 or more power, Dragon's Power deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
